name: Epochs of Enmity
storyline: In this episode, Ranger is stranded in time; he must find an exit and fight through the hordes of Shub-Niggurath scattered across the eras to go back to his timeline.
summary: Epochs of Enmity (EoE) is an original Episode Pack for Quake, a collection of 12 maps. A group of reputable mappers has been gathered together to form a “vanilla feel” episode. The goal was to create an “unofficial 6th” episode, to follow Quake’s unofficial 5th, Dimension of the Past. The focus was to design a series of various themed maps, where Ranger is traveling through time to stop the evil that is tainting the time continuum. Main maps had to include at least one quad, stay within the range of 100 enemies (more if multiple quads exist), and not use external models or sounds; however, skyboxes, colored lighting, and the fog were okay. Mappers for the episode include the following: Bal, Fairweather, FifthElephant, Greenwood, JCR, Jpal, Markie Music, Nolcoz, Rhoq, and ZungryWare. Due to the use of the progs_dump mod, some minor, “quality of life” changes have been made. Epochs of Enmity also includes an original soundtrack.
